text: Lepetodrilus galriftensis is a species of small, deep-sea sea snail, a hydrothermal vent limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetodrilidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in hydrothermal vents and seeps of the Galápagos Rift, East Pacific ==References== * Warén, A. & Bouchet, P. (2001) Gastropoda and Monoplacophora from hydrothermal vents and seeps; new taxa and records. The Veliger, 44, 116–231 Category:Lepetodrilidae Category:Gastropods described in 1988
title: Lepetodrilus galriftensis
